page.title: 12AROUND LITTLEMILL SCHOOL
page.content: One house next door to the school is now privately owned, but was originally built for a Mr.Crocket who was the Littlemill Pit manager. The house was,therefore,the property of the Coal Board and it was only in the last ten years that it was released for private sale. The schoolmaster stayed in the school house at the other side of the school. The local nurse also lived in a part of this house so that she could be easily contacted. The house still belongs to the Education Department and is now inhabited by the retired headteacher of Coylton Primary School.
